channel.title: Interface Builder on Krzysztof Zabłocki
channel.description: Recent content in Interface Builder on Krzysztof Zabłocki

item.title: Tips for Interface Builder
item.description:
Young developers are happy when they write a lot of code, they like to brag about that project that has tens of thousands lines of code they wrote.

As we get more experienced, we realize that code is expensive. It’s expensive to maintain, debug and reason about.

That’s why we should aim to use tools that can help us avoid writing boilerplate code, one of those tools is Interface Builder.

Here are a few of my favourite tips & tricks.

item.title: iOS Game with Interface Builder
item.description: By the end of this tutorial you will have a simple game with level editor under 250 lines of code.

item.title: Quick tip for Interface Builder
item.description: Do you use Interface Builder ? Even if you don’t like IB, read this short tip and referenced articles.
